stochastic_function: lambda market_salary, company_culture: {1:0.7,0:0.2,-1:0.1} if market_salary ==1 and company_culture ==1 else {1:0.3,0:0.3,-1:0.4} if (market_salary ==1 or company_culture ==1) else {1:0.1,0:0.2,-1:0.7}

lambda recruitment_decision, workload, employee_productivity: {1:0.8,0:0.15,-1:0.05} if recruitment_decision == 'hire' and workload == 1 and employee_productivity == 1 else {1:0.3,0:0.5,-1:0.2} if recruitment_decision == 'do not hire' and workload == 0 and employee_productivity == -1 else {1:0.5,0:0.3,-1:0.2}
